hero.name: Dillon Khanna
hero.description: Building robust, scalable systems that translate complex ideas into real-world impact. I work across the full technology stack, from AI experiments to production infrastructure, always focused on creating tools that solve meaningful problems.

techFocus.headline: Building with a modern, scalable toolchain.

projects.title: AI Document Management Platform
projects.result: RESULT → 95% reduction in manual data entry
projects.description: A RAG pipeline to create an intelligent, searchable knowledge base from user documents.

principles.title: Scale Through Simplicity
principles.description: The most scalable systems follow simple patterns applied consistently. Complex architectures often collapse under their own weight—elegant ones adapt and grow.
